sentences.en: Frank is of the opinion that the 1934 yacht should have won.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克认为本该是那艘1934年的帆船获胜。

sentences.en: He asked his wife’s opinion on every important decision.
sentences.cn: 凡是重要的决定他都会征求妻子的意见。

sentences.en: He mobilized public opinion all over the world against hydrogen-bomb tests.
sentences.cn: 他动员全世界的舆论反对氢弹试验。

sentences.en: He seemed a bit biased against women in my opinion.
sentences.cn: 我认为他好像对女性有点儿成见。

sentences.en: I was firmly of the opinion that we should not give Jackson any more money.
sentences.cn: 我坚决主张不要再给杰克逊钱了。

sentences.en: Medical opinion varies on how many tablets it takes to overdose.
sentences.cn: 医生对于服用多少药片算作过量意见不一。

sentences.en: Members of Parliament are spending the weekend canvassing opinion in their constituencies.
sentences.cn: 国会议员这个周末要向所在选区的选民征求意见。

sentences.en: Such a motion is considered a test of backbench opinion.
sentences.cn: 这样的动议被视为对后座议员立场的考验。

sentences.en: The Chandler twins were coming round to the same opinion.
sentences.cn: 钱德勒家的这对双胞胎也最终统一了意见。

sentences.en: The latest opinion polls are predicting a very close contest.
sentences.cn: 最近的民意测验预测竞争将会非常激烈。

sentences.en: The majority of sex offenders have a low opinion of themselves.
sentences.cn: 大多数性犯罪者都瞧不起自己。

sentences.en: The problem simply resulted from a difference of opinion.
sentences.cn: 这个问题仅仅是由于意见分歧引起的。

sentences.en: The result reflects a modest rightward shift in opinion.
sentences.cn: 结果显示舆论出现一定程度的右倾。

sentences.en: This brings the law into line with most medical opinion.
sentences.cn: 这使得该法与绝大多数医学见解保持了一致。

sentences.en: Today on the streets of Montreal, opinion seems still to waver.
sentences.cn: 今日在蒙特利尔的街头巷尾，人们的意见仍摇摆不定。

sentences.en: We have agreed to part company after differences of opinion.
Weber gave a fair hearing to anyone who held a different opinion.
sentences.cn: 韦伯让持不同意见的人都能有机会发表意见。

sentences.en: When choosing an insurance policy it’s best to get an independent opinion.
sentences.cn: 选择保险时，最好听听专家的独立意见。

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 依我看来，在我看来
根据某人的看法；在……看来
其他人的意见；补充性的意见

trans.tran_en: your ideas or beliefs about a particular subject
